articles.content: CANBERRA (Reuters) - Australia will next week introduce landmark legislation to force Alphabets Google and Facebook to pay publishers and broadcasters for content, a senior government official said o… [+2036 chars]

articles.author: Jason Knowles
articles.title: Chicago carjackings: Uber, Lyft drivers say fake names, no profile pictures make it easier for criminals to target them - WLS-TV
articles.description: Drivers for Uber and Lyft targeted for carjacking in Chicago and the suburbs are calling for rideshare platforms to change their policies on nicknames and photos, They say carjackers use fake names and no profile pic to prey on them.
articles.content: CHICAGO (WLS) -- Rideshare drivers are calling for changes to popular platforms in response to a dramatic increase in carjackings.A dive into the data reveals the hotspots for the crimes, and concern… [+4363 chars]

articles.author: Natalie Rahhal U.S.
articles.title: Pfizer vaccine DOES work against super-covid variants, study suggests - Daily Mail
articles.description: Researchers found that one dose might not prevent infection by the South African variant, but prompts infection-fighting T cells. Two doses will likely be protective, the Oxford University study said.
articles.content: Pfizer's coronavirus vaccine does work against the new variant that emerged in the UK, as well as against the South African variant that scientists have worried might evade shots, new research sugges… [+4655 chars]
